profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-03-08T13:55-0800. Supplementary encoding and revision by Caroline Cubé using Notetab Pro.

did.unittitle: Roger Memos scripts
did.abstract: Television producer Roger Memos is best known for his work on television talk shows. The collection consists of script files and occasional production information from the television talk shows Caryl and Marilyn: Real Friends, Donnie and Marie, The George and Alana Show, The Megan Mullally Show and The Suzanne Somers Show.
did.physloc: Stored off-site at SRLF. Advance notice is required for access to the collection. Please contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical object belong to the UCLA Library Special Collections. Literary rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Roger Memos Scripts (Collection 2244). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of scripts files related to the career of television producer and clearance administrator Roger Memos. Included are script drafts and occasional production information representing television talk shows: Caryl and Marilyn: Real Friends, Donnie and Marie, The George and Alana Show, The Megan Mullally Show and The Suzanne Somers Show. Additionally there is a very small amount of background information about guests for The Suzanne Somers Show.

arrangement.head: Organization and Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in alphabetical order by project title.

Caryl and Marilyn: Real Friends - shows 96008-96020 scripts and production information.

scopecontent.p: Guests include: Ron Popeil, David Carradine, Ed Begley, Barbara Billingsley, Florence Henderson, Thelma Houston, Julia Sweeney, Dennis Franz, Dr. Joyce Brothers, among others.
